item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, November 29, 2024 at 3:00 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Send someone you appreciate an official 'Continue and Persist' Letter (344 points | 46 comments)
2. The UX of Lego Interface Panels (2020) (250 points | 23 comments)
3. Hetzner raises prices while significantly lowering bandwidth (US) (275 points | 211 comments)
4. The success and failure of Ninja (2020) (124 points | 26 comments)
5. Car tires shed a quarter of all microplastics in the environment (75 points | 44 comments)
6. A pretty visualisation of the European power grid (2022) (202 points | 101 comments)
7. Tk9.0: CGo-free, cross platform GUI toolkit for Go (146 points | 45 comments)
8. In the Rockets' Red Glare: The past and future of hot-rodding in America (38 points | 21 comments)
9. Rapid colonization of a space-returned Ryugu sample by terrestrial microorganism (51 points | 22 comments)
10. AI and the Last Mile 2: Subsidiarity (31 points | 4 comments)
11. The Thinker Who Believed in Doing (2018) (19 points | discuss)
12. Bootkitty: Analyzing the first UEFI bootkit for Linux (106 points | 44 comments)
13. Engineers Do Not Get to Make Startup Mistakes When They Build Ledgers (56 points | 53 comments)
14. The Denver OWASP Chapter is proud to present SnowFROC '25 (10 points | discuss)
15. A new start after 60: I became a 'hummingbird' for people with dementia (81 points | 9 comments)
16. Canada Competition Bureau sues Google for anti-competitive conduct in online ads (19 points | 2 comments)
17. You can use C-Reduce for any language (458 points | 102 comments)
18. Aftershock II (8 points | 1 comment)
19. QwQ: Alibaba's O1-like reasoning LLM (294 points | 220 comments)
20. London's 850-year-old food markets to close (253 points | 204 comments)
21. Show HN: Myphotos.site – Make a gallery website from Google Photos (148 points | 70 comments)
22. Template Mixins (14 points | discuss)
23. Malware can turn off webcam LED and record video, demonstrated on ThinkPad X230 (974 points | 499 comments)
24. Spotify has shut down several API endpoints (157 points | 120 comments)
25. Bananas: Cross-Platform screen sharing made simple (182 points | 51 comments)
26. A washing machine for human beings, from 1970 (129 points | 171 comments)
27. MIT Aluminum Bicycle Project 1974 (2016) (175 points | 134 comments)
28. In Praise of Print: Reading Is Essential in an Era of Epistemological Collapse (304 points | 269 comments)
29. Show HN: Voice-Pro – AI Voice Cloning (243 points | 160 comments)
30. PRoot: User-space implementation of chroot, mount –bind, and binfmt_misc (121 points | 48 comments)
